name: Heavy Weight
description:
=- HEAVY WEIGHT -=

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #180 by megalo98 and King-R
Theme: My weakness is also my strength

=- ABOUT -=

Platform your way to the end, picking up and dropping weights along the way.

  • When you are heavy, you won't be able to jump as high. However, you'll be able to squash enemies with ease.
  • When you are lightweight, you'll be able to jump much higher and reach new places, But touching enemies will kill you, so platform carefully.
  • Dying will put you back at the start, however enemies killed will stay killed. You'll also keep your weight, so use this to your advantage

This is my first ever gamejam submission woah (be nice please<3)

this game is pretty bad, but I had fun and learnt more about pixel art so I'm still proud of it :)
